arts.ttl: Atalanta vs. Sassuolo: level on points
arts.sum: Atalanta come into this on 9 consecutive home wins against Sassuolo, who last came away from Bergamo unscathed in the 1-1 on 8 April 2017 (Cristante`s goal for the nerazzurri and Lorenzo Pellegrini for the neroverdi, now teammates at Gasperini`s Roma). Atalanta look to bounce back from their first defeat of the season, while Sassuolo could leapfrog their opponents.
